session_metadata.title: Test Status Tracking & Quality Infrastructure Session

problems_solved.problem: CI failures blocking development - all checks failing unclear which are intentional vs bugs
problems_solved.solution: Implemented intelligent test status tracking system with phase-based expected failures and enhanced pytest reporting

methodologies.name: Phase-Based-Test-Management
methodologies.description: Define explicit test expectations per development phase to distinguish intentional TDD failures from real bugs - eliminates analysis paralysis

insights.insight: Explicit state documentation eliminates ambiguity - when development state is explicitly documented developers can focus on real issues instead of analyzing every failure
